scripts.build: mkdir -p build;rm -rf build/* && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js && cp html/index.html favicons/* build/ && cp -r design/ build/ && cp html/index.html build/404.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rm -rf node_modules/gh-pages/.cache/ && gh-pages -d build/
scripts.deploy-tshi3: npm run build && (echo 'tshi3.itaigi.tw' > build/CNAME) && rm -rf node_modules/gh-pages/.cache/ && gh-pages -r https://github.com/g0v-frontend-test/itaigi-tshi3.git -d build/
scripts.deploy-giam7: npm run build && (echo 'giam7.itaigi.tw' > build/CNAME) && rm -rf node_modules/gh-pages/.cache/ && gh-pages -r https://github.com/g0v-frontend-test/itaigi-giam7.git -d build/
scripts.deploy-test: npm run build && (echo 'test.itaigi.tw' > build/CNAME) && rm -rf node_modules/gh-pages/.cache/ && gh-pages -r https://github.com/g0v-frontend-test/itaigi-test.git -d build/
